attributes.action: Protect workers looking after us during lock down. Supply/Postal/Retail sectors
attributes.additional_details: To protect everyone. If supply lines are to keep running we must protect people in all these vital areas.  From fruit pickers to lorry drivers to postmen to shelf stacker in the supermarket.
attributes.background: Business managers are under pressure to deliver in this crisis situation, but workers should not be pressured into risking their lives and others by inadequate social distancing/lack of equipment.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307866

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
